Title: Shubh Aarambh
Writer: Abhinay Banker (dialogue), Abhinay Banker (screenplay), Vipul Sharma (story)
Actors: Harsh Chhaya, Prachi Shah, Bharat Chowda, Deeksha Joshi
Plot: In the midst of her wedding, a young girl tries to save a 28 year old love marriage, of her future in-laws, which is falling apart.
